message: Now I only see (1) for a second and then it disappears. Confirmed two other friends are seeing the same behavior now.
On launch day if I had a window open to a topic and it was minimized, it would show the unread message count in the title until I focused on the window, then it would disappear.
Oh, another thing, this is only for the topic that is active. If there are unread messages in other topics they will still show until I click over to the topic.
